channel.title: Can someone host an ip for me?
channel.description:
Hi there, im an owner of my server, un-fortunately its hamachi, and i have had huge troubles trying to make non-hamachi, not very good with instructions to be honest.. :(
So i was wondering if somebody, could make a no-ip adress that works, and is online, so i could use it to advertise on moparscape seeing as hamachi server advertising is disabled, i apologise if its against the rules.
If you can do this for me please mail me on ben_frowen_2008@hotmail.com
Thank allot! :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 26, 2008, 04:36:44 pm[/size][hr]Can i add that, admin position on my server will be given.
